name: Space Opera
description:
NOTICE FOR CHROME
Might not work on latest versions of the Chrome browser, because Google dropped the compatibility for the Unity-Plugin. Please use IE, Safari or Firefox instead.

CONTROLS
if game doesn't respond, make sure to click the frame of the game at least once (so it gains focus)
controls should work, after the game's logo has fully arrived the stage (~4 sec)

LUDUM DARE
Game for Ludum Dare #31. Theme: " Entire Game on One Screen".
See jam entry: HERE.

HIGHSCORE SirRicecake's mother 378 sec pgf 263 sec SirRicecake 230 sec CREDITS Art -> pgf WEBSITE Code/Sound -> SirRicecake
